mdRecord.dcterms:title: C and P Telephone Plan
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Boucher reviews a plan for C and P Telephone, now known as Verizon, with Hugh Stallard, who was the president of the Virginia branch of C and P, during a Showcasing Southwest Virginia visit in Pulaski
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Telephone
Virginia, Southwest
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Boucher, Rick
